code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Dashboard(props){const[isloggedin,setlog]=useState(false);const[user,setuser]=useState(null);const changetheme=()=>{props.oncolor();};const buttonStyle={backgroundColor:props.colorno?"blues":"#4caf50"};const handleGoogleSignIn=()=>{window.location.href='/auth/google';};useEffect(()=>{const checkAuth=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get('/api/check-auth');if(response.data.loggedIn){setlog(true);setuser(response.data.user);}}catch(error){console.error("Error checking auth status:",error);}};checkAuth();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("header",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Rise Up"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",children:"Home"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/task",children:"Tasks"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/shop",children:"Shop"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/profile",children:"My Profile"})})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"header-right",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{style:buttonStyle,className:"light-button",onClick:changetheme,children:"lightmode"}),isloggedin?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:["Welcome, ",user.name]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/logout",className:"login-button",children:"Logout"})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/login",className:"login-button",children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleGoogleSignIn,style:{marginTop:'10px'},children:"Sign in with Google"})]})]})]});}export default Dashboard;
